#### Description 

Turn a date time vector to timestamp format

#### Usage
<pre><code>
datetime_to_timestamp(dt)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 
* ``dt``: Date or datetime vector

#### Examples
```{r}
datetime_to_timestamp(
as.Date(c("2015-05-08", "2015-09-12"),Format = "%Y-%m-%d"))

```
